name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum, fill glass with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with mint.

name: Margarita
instructions: Rim glass with salt. Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into glass and garnish with lime.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar and bitters, add whiskey and ice, stir, and garnish with orange twist.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with lime.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a glass, and garnish with a cherry or lemon slice.

name: Martini
instructions:
Add the gin, dry vermouth, and orange bitters into a mixing glass with ice and stir until very cold.

Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Garnish with olives.

name: Negroni
instructions:
Add the gin, Campari and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir until well-chilled.

Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.

Garnish with an orange peel. Optionally you can twist the orange peel over the glass prior to garnishing.

name: Manhattan
instructions:
Add the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled.

Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora or coupe glass.

Garnish with a brandied cherry

name: White Russian
instructions:
Add the vodka and Kahlúa to a rocks glass filled with ice.

Top with the heavy cream and stir.
